events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the size chart was misleading and the item is unusable for me.
Based on the customer message indicating a return and refund request, this case has been categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sophia for handling the refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'll be happy to assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging? This will help us process your refund efficiently.
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 8675309, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging.
We have initiated your refund process. Please send back the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly. Once received, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the clear instructions and quick action. I appreciate the prepaid return label and prompt support.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. You should see the credited amount in your original payment method within 3 business days.
We wanted to check in and confirm that your refund has been received. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our store.
